title: Knock Out
description: A Reynolds Security Novel This is a stand alone novel but does contain spoilers to the Book 1 in the Series 'Morning After'.  Jace Carpenter is admittedly gun shy about women these days and a woman who works for him is completely off limits. But there is something about the feisty little boxer that keeps him coming back to the ring night after night.  Lou Santiago has less than zero interest in men. She refuses to be charmed by her charismatic boss no matter how smoking hot he is. Unfortunately, his patience is greater than her resolve. When she realizes she is being set up she'll need his help and resources to figure out who's behind it.    Warning Contains Adult Content
author: Melissa Hale
